meanings.sent1: The waterproofed jacket kept me dry during the rainstorm.
meanings.sent2: She wore a waterproofed hat to protect herself from the downpour.
meanings.sent3: The waterproofed umbrella decided it was too sunny to be used.
meanings.sent4: His waterproofed shoes were like shields against the wet ground.
meanings.sent5: The waterproofed tent stood strong against the heavy rain.

meanings.definition: Treated to make impervious to water.
meanings.sent1: The waterproofed fabric on the bag prevented any leaks.
meanings.sent2: They used waterproofed paint to protect the wooden fence from the rain.
meanings.sent3: The waterproofed boat refused to float in the dry desert.
meanings.sent4: Her waterproofed phone case saved it from the water spill.
meanings.sent5: The waterproofed basement stayed dry even during the flood.
